mapper.sql: tm_id, sid_month, sid, `month`, `name`, numbers, free_times, discount_times, total_times,update_time
mapper.select:
select from m_trip_month
name like #{name} '%'
and `month`>=#{start}
and #{end}>=`month`
order by tm_id desc
mapper.insert: insert into m_trip_month (tm_id, sid_month, sid, `month`, `name`, numbers, free_times, discount_times, total_times,update_time) values (#{tmId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sidMonth,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{month,jdbcType=DATE}, #{name,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{numbers,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{freeTimes,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{discountTimes,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{totalTimes,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
